attributes.action: Misconduct and misuse of Every Child Matters Act. The victimisation of parents by social services anpsychological impact on children placed in care.
attributes.additional_details: A petition to investigate the misconduct of social services and the victimisation of parents and exploiting Every Child Matters Act to satisfy social services policies and procedures and statistical targets. Investigating statistical relating to the unnecessary removal of children from the home to foster care and the psychological impact on the children placed in care.
